name: Claw (itch)
description:
Community Game Jam Submission.

Find a way out from the dark maze. Torch is your only friend. Use it to scare off ghosts. Can you survive? Can you get out from this trap?

GameJam theme is "the Game is a liar", and you may think that there is no escape and you can't finish the game... it's not true! There is an proper ending.  Reveal all the misteries and conquer the maze.

Game made in one week, but I really like the concept and will continue to work on it.

Ingame music made by Kresendorfin.

kresendorfin@gmail.com
